name: Blue Life
description:
Colors 42
Colors speak to us Seeing any color conveys a feeling to us When I was a student I considered color the best medium to show my mood Happiness.
I exposed my daily grief and conflicts to my friends by combining colors and creating a work of art.
you can feel love and beauty by seeing different colors that are next to each other or nested in a frame.
Road map:
This collection includes 100 works of art that will be uploaded ONE OF ONE will be uploaded in Hic et nunc
After selling the first 20 works one work will be given as a gift to the person who has bought the most of these works.
Every Sunday 10 works from this collection are uploaded
